caption: Upload Image(s)
doc: Upload the files from the File selector element, or any native element you have rendered the Images in.

AAW.caption: No Files Selected Message
AAW.default_val: You haven't selected any files. Please select some files.
AAW.doc: This message is displayed if a user tries to upload a file, if no files are selected.
AAW.name: no_files_selected_message

AAZ.caption: Files to Upload
AAZ.doc: These are the files you want to upload.
AAZ.name: files_to_upload
